post: I feel like for the past 5-10 years ive been alternating through multiple different masks, if that makes sense. I tried to take personality tests but i know what answers to pick on them to get the mbti type i “want” in the moment. Not necessarily on purpose, but i feel like i delude myself into thinking im similar to a person/character i admire.

i’m 26 turning 27 in June 2026 and i’m really struggling with the reality that i’m getting older and running out of time. I am in a depressive episode at the moment (the worst i have ever been) we’re in fine one minute and crying the next.

I feel like I’m stuck in this stage in my relationship where we keep seeing each other’s flaws and tension is high. Lately, I’ve been feeling really low, even though I act like everything’s fine. I know he’s been distant and I’m almost certain he’s going to break up with me soon. It’s like there’s this constant, heavy dot of anxiety in my chest, and I don’t know how to deal with it. I just feel helpless and scared about what’s coming. I keep replaying every little thing he said or did, trying to guess when it will happen. I feel trapped in my own thoughts, like I can’t breathe, but I can’t bring myself to let go either. Part of me wants to fight for us, but another part knows it’s over. I just want to feel calm again, to stop this heavy knot in my chest, but right now, it feels impossible.
